greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Reversion of o.g.f. for Bell numbers (A000110) omitting a(0)=1.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Index entries for reversions of series
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = x - Sum_{k>=2} Bell(k) * A(x)^k. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 22 2020
maple: read transforms; A := series(exp(exp(x)-1),x,60); SERIESTOLISTMULT(%); subsop(1=NULL,%); REVERT(%);
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
